statements: UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 10.5, unit_of_measurement = 'kg' WHERE ingredient_id = 'abc-123';
UPDATE ingredients SET unit_of_measurement = 'grams', quantity = 500 WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy';
UPDATE ingredients SET country_of_origin='Italy', quantity=5.25 WHERE ingredient_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ingredients SET unit_of_measurement='grams', ingredient_name='Basil' WHERE country_of_origin='France';
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 100 WHERE name = 'Salt';
UPDATE recipes SET cuisine_type = 'Italian', preparation_time = 60 WHERE name = 'Spaghetti Aglio e Olio';
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE recipes SET cuisine_type = 'Italian', preparation_time = 60 WHERE name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara';
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 50, price = 10.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE recipes SET cuisine_type = 'Italian', difficulty_level = 'Easy' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 100, price = 10.5 WHERE origin_country = 'Italy' AND name = 'Tomato';
UPDATE recipes SET difficulty_level = 'Intermediate', cuisine_type = 'Italian' WHERE name = 'Pasta Carbonara';
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_location = 'USA', contact_info = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_location = 'New Location' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE suppliers SET country = 'USA', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE ingredients SET quantity = quantity + 10, country_of_origin = 'Italy' WHERE name = 'Tomato';
UPDATE inventory SET price = 5.99, expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE ingredient_id IN (SELECT id FROM ingredients WHERE name = 'Sugar');
